mapper.update: update advice set title=#{title}, content=#{content},date=#{date},reg_date=now(),manager_name=#{manager_name},customer_code=#{customer_code} where advice_no=#{advice_no};
mapper.select: select a.advice_no, a.title,a.content,a.date,a.manager_name,a.reg_date,a.customer_code,b.name,b.address from advice as a, customer as b where a.customer_code=b.customer_code and id=#{id} and date=#{date};
